document.full_text: glencore , the global commodities trading giant, is set to appear before the listing committee of the hong kong stock exchange this week, the strongest sign yet it will go ahead with a roughly $10 billion ipo, two sources with direct knowledge of the plans told reuters on monday.
document.title: glencore to seek hk ipo approval this week: sources
lines_and_colors: glencore , the global commodities trading giant, is set to appear before the listing committee of the hong kong stock exchange this week, the strongest sign yet it will go ahead with a roughly $10 billion ipo, two sources with direct knowledge of the plans told reuters on monday.
